name: Miniature Underwater Polo
description:
2 to 4 local multiplayer game

There's not enough water surface to play regular water polo, so this tiny animals are forced to play Miniature Underwater Polo!

Don't get too caught up in the game, get to the surface before you run out of air!

Smash your opponents' faces to make them lose a lot of air, but be careful, you breathe out every time you throw a punch.

--------------

We have fixed the bug that made the game unplayable! Go enjoy it now!

LD link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/miniature-underwater-polo
